Title: Ola Holm to John Holm Card 1933.12.19
Description: POST CARD WITH A PICTURE OF THE TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY AT TRONDHJEM FROM OLA HOLM, POST STAMPED DECEMBER 19-1933, TO MR. JOHN HOLM, COLMAN, SO DAK, U.S.A.  A RED 20 Ã˜RE STAMP WITH LION.
Creator: Ola Holm
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
Merry Christmas and happy New Year is wished by us all.  We are all fine,  Hope the same with you.  Thank you for your letter

Best wishes from us all

Ole
